  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class QuestionInExamObject
extends javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane
    Author:
    Naor Saadia this is controller and root class for private use control implementation the object have 4 buttons for answeres and lable for questions
